attributes.action: Not allow Margaret Thatcher a State Funeral
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Well. At the moment it is just me and my son. How else am I to explain to him that the woman who was responsible for the decimation of the mining industry, which had employed his grandad, great grandad and great uncle, is to be honoured in such a way.
Eh?
Best wishes, Melanie Boycott

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
